actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to prohibit the seller of an electric vehicle from being treated as the taxpayer that placed such vehicle in service and taking the electric vehicle tax credit if such vehicle is sold to the Federal Government.
short_title: No Subsidies for Government Purchases of Electric Vehicles Act
subjects: Hybrid, electric, and advanced technology vehicles

summary.text:
No Subsidies for Government Purchases of Electric Vehicles Act

This bill disallows a tax credit for qualified plug-in electric drive motor vehicles that are sold to the federal government or a state government.

titles.title: No Subsidies for Government Purchases of Electric Vehicles Act
No Subsidies for Government Purchases of Electric Vehicles Act

To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to prohibit the seller of an electric vehicle from being treated as the taxpayer that placed such vehicle in service and taking the electric vehicle tax credit if such vehicle is sold to the Federal Government.
